data.title: IT Technician
data.description: Maintenance of computer equipment and assistance. Maintenance and management of the company website. Troubleshooting issues related to networks, software, etc. Creation of Excel templates.

data.title: Founder and Developer
data.description: Web design and development using the Wordpress platform, PHP, CSS, and Javascript. Maintenance and management of eCommerce orders with WooCommerce technology. Use of various plugins for SEO, security, backups, etc.

data.title: Front-End Developer
data.description: Front-end web development using React.js, Next.js, WordPress, PHP, CSS, SASS, Tailwind, and Javascript. Worked in a collaborative team environment and familiarized with Scrum methodologies.

data.degree: Master's in Web Design and Development
Advanced Vocational Training in Development of Web Applications
